raw_body: REV. FR. NALIN SURAJA,​ of the Archdiocese of Colombo,​ expired on Monday the 30th October 2023. He is the beloved son of Mr H.D. Edwin Joseph and Mrs W.D. Irangani Mallika. His remains will lie in state at St. Anthony’s Church,​ Kongodamulla,​ on Wednesday 1st November from 10 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. and thereafter transferred to Our Lady of Good Voyage Church,​ Duwa,​ On Thursday,​ 2nd November at 7.00 p.m. His remains will be taken to St. Joseph’s Church,​ Pamunugama. The Requiem Mass will be held on Friday,​ the 3rd November at 9.30 a.m. followed by burial at the Church Cemetery at Pamunugama. Archbishop’s House,​ Borella.070321
